name: cyber_serpent
description:
writhing through the digital abyss, the cyber serpent musn't miss...
snake meets twin-stick shooter. slither and shoot your way through endless waves of polygonal enemies for a high score in this modern take on retro classics.

key_features
  • classic snake gameplay with a modern twin-stick twist.
  • left stick to move, right stick to shoot. also works with keyboard and mouse.
  • infinite mode with online leaderboard.
  • challenge mode with 30 curated waves and a boss fight.
  • pulsating lights set to 90's electronica.
  • retro-inspired wireframe graphics.
